column4: News;Preah Sihanouk Province: A Cambodian woman living in Sangkat No.2
column5: who asked not to be named
column6: has complained to reporters that Chinese
column8: Thai and Cambodian women are openly involved with the sex trade in the neighbourhood..------At one location in Village 1
column12: has now become a sex trade site
column13: 40 meters away from the main road.------Law enforcement are being asked to investigate the violations of Cambodian law and find out who is responsible for these businesses.------Original Source------ (later repeated in ------Arey News------)
